attributes.action: We must leave the ECHR now
attributes.additional_details: We the people demand to leave the ECHR.
attributes.background:
Our country is no longer safe whilst we are involved with the ECHR.  
It is them who are blocking us from removing illegal immigrants. 
We must act now

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Leave the European Convention on Human Rights (ECHR)
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729027
